bibl.title: Un commentario all'Alcibiade I (Pap. Oxy. 1609 + Pap. Princeton Inv. AM 11224 C).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XIII, 1609 (= Pack2 2569) + P. Princ. Inv. AM 11224 C [ed.: Bruce H. Kraut, Two Papyri from the Princeton Collection, ZPE 51 (1983) pp. 75-79 et pl. I c (voir II)].
Funghi Maria Serena, Un commentario all'Alcibiade I (Pap. Oxy. 1609 + Pap. Princeton Inv. AM 11224 C).
